Name: Sunset Bruschetta
Description: Grilled bread topped with a medley of tomatoes, fresh basil, and balsamic glaze.

Name: Avocado Spring Rolls
Description: rispy spring rolls filled with avocado, sun-dried tomatoes, and cilantro, served with a tamarind-cashew dip.

Name: Mini Crab Cakes
Description: bite-sized crab cakes served with a tangy remoulade sauce.

Name: Chicken Satay
Description: Grilled chicken skewers served with a peanut dipping sauce.

Name: Harvest Garden Salad
Description: Mixed greens with cucumbers, cherry tomatoes, red onions, and croutons, served with your choice of dressing.

Name: Caesar Supreme Salad
Description: Crisp romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, and croutons tossed in a creamy Caesar dressing.

Name: Greek Salad
Description: Mixed greens with kalamata olives, feta cheese, red onions, and cucumbers, served with a Greek dressing.

Name: Classic Ribeye Steak
Description: 12 oz. ribeye steak cooked to perfection, served with garlic mashed potatoes and steamed vegetables.

Name: Lemon Herb Chicken
Description: Grilled chicken breast marinated in lemon and herbs, served with wild rice and sautéed green beans.

Name: Pasta Primavera
Description: A delightful mix of seasonal vegetables tossed with penne pasta in a light olive oil and garlic sauce.

Name: Grilled Salmon
Description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled and served with quinoa and steamed asparagus.

Name: Chicken Alfredo
Description: Grilled chicken breast served over fettuccine pasta in a creamy Alfredo sauce.

Name: Chocolate Lava Cake
Description: Warm chocolate cake with a molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.

Name: Tropical Cheesecake
Description: Creamy cheesecake topped with a mango-pineapple glaze.

Name: Tiramisu
Description: Classic Italian dessert with layers of espresso-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

Name: House Lemonade
Description: Freshly squeezed lemonade with a hint of mint.

Name: Sparkling Mineral Water
Description: AChilled sparkling water with a twist of lime.

Name: Craft Beers
Description: A rotating selection of local craft beers.
